credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: New Republic Clothiers:  Type Jacket
description: The design features a full-length image of a man wearing a jacket, opened, composed of lines of text, imprinted in black on white; white shirt; white-on-black polka dotted tie; and black pants, socks and shoes. His head is tilted to the left, and he is smiling and wearing black-rimmed glasses. His arms, bent at the elbow, end in white hands resting just below the waist. To the right, below, are imprinted New Republic (in capitals)/ Fine Clothiers/ 93 Spring Street (in upper and lower case).
name: advertisement
